mapper.select: select company 회사, batch_month 해당년월, sum(total_sales_amount) 총매출가, sum(total_purchase_amount) 총매입가 from t_sales_result group by company, department, batch_month having company = #{company} and department = #{department} and batch_month between to_char(now(), 'yyyy01') and to_char(now(), 'yyyy12') order by batch_month
